en.title: Donate
en.description: Your help is needed to provide food, shelter, lifesaving medical care and legal support to people who have been through so much across the Balkans and Mediterranean routes. Check our campaigns and choose which one fits better with your values and interests.

values.title: 100% INDEPENDENT
values.description: We keep our freedom to claim justice and to fight the negligent violation of human rights at the EU borders.

values.title: IMPACTFUL
values.description: NNK teams work on the field to identify needs and solutions 365 days per year.

values.title: TRANSPARENCY
values.description: Our accountability is free-access for everyone who wants to know the final use of their donations.

en.transfer: If can donate by bank transfer or PayPal. For more info:
